text: if you want to go out with your friends
if you want to have fun if you want to
stay awake you want to get hungry I can
make you a cocktail that can make you
feel like your mommy just tucks you it
gave you a little tiny gift or little
bonbon this is master mixologist alex
ott i'll be here today to show you two
amazing cocktails one of them is called
the fountain of youth the gin-based spa
cocktail and these are not fancy
ingredients make sure you wash the
cucumber before you do anything with it
I cut about three slices off with the
skin on it you use a muddle stick now
this is a little bit big but the bigger
it is the better it is for your wrists
you don't destroy the food you just want
to get the flavor out of it and then we
add about 3 ounces of white cranberry
juice films is an herbal liqueur that
comes from Britain and we use a tiny
little dash of this and then we use our
spirit and our spirit will be Jen today
i'll be using an American dry gentleness
is a great Jim Gordon Amsterdam we're
going to be using about an ounce and a
half to two ounces of this since the
cranberry juice is already ascetic
enough we just need a tiny little
squeeze of lime to make this cocktail
refreshing make sure you use a lot of
ice and this my friends is the Fountain
of Youth
the second cocktail is called little
death it's an aphrodisiac and how do I
know it's an aphrodisiac and not only
have I tried it out on everyone that I
know but it's made with damiana leaf
which is a natural aphrodisiac so poor
about two teaspoons of damiana leaf into
hot water stir it up let it sit for
about two to three minutes for this
cocktail we need about three ounces of
tea and you sweeten it with about a
teaspoon of sugar just going to use a
teaspoon of raspberry jam and there you
can see it already adds a little bit of
color to it and in order to add a little
bit of freshness I add a couple of fresh
raspberries to it in the main spirit
that I've chosen for this drink is a
single malt scotch and for this one I
use a 12 year old make sure it's not too
smoky the macallan 12 will do just fine
so you add about an ounce and a half to
two ounces we'll just do a little tiny
squeeze of fresh lemon and this is

you can sprinkle some herbs on top of

this my friends is the little death you
